<<<<<<< HEAD Keychain
← Return to Projects

Keychain

Download PDF Template

Time: 30 minutes

Level: 1

Supplies

  • Scrap cardboard
  • 1/8 in. x 4 in. x 6 in. acrylic sheet
  • Engraving tool
  • Keyring
  • Paint or markers
  • Sandpaper
1

Draw Your Design

Start by sketching a small diamond shape on paper or use the provided template. Add an insignia or logo in the center of the diamond. Ensure the design fits within the dimensions of the acrylic sheet.

2

Secure Materials

Open the lid on your bloc enclosure. Place the sacrificial material (cardboard) on the aluminum bed, then place the acrylic sheet on top. Use clamps to secure the materials in place, ensuring they do not move during cutting. Close the lid.

3

Engrave and Cut

Using the bloc console, select the travel mode and align the spindle with the starting point of your design. Switch to cut mode and turn on the spindle. Lower the Z Axis Joystick to engrave the insignia in the center of the diamond shape.

Once the engraving is complete, adjust the spindle to cut out the diamond shape. Follow the edges of the design using the X-Y Axis Joystick. Ensure the spindle cuts through the acrylic sheet without damaging the aluminum bed below.

4

Finish and Assemble

Turn off the spindle and vacuum, then open the lid. Remove the clamps and take out the acrylic sheet. Sand the edges of the diamond shape for a smooth finish. Attach the keyring through the pre-drilled hole at the top of the diamond. Optionally, paint or decorate the insignia for a personalized touch.

======= Keychain
